name: Last Strike Alpha
description:
Welcome To Last Strike Alpha

The Competitive Low Poly FPS Game!

Just Like Any Other FPS Game It Contains Load outs, Ranks and Of Course Multiplayer!

Note: The Alpha Will Be Free To Play But The Full Game Will Be Around 10$ USD

System Requirements
    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 7
    • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
    • Memory: 3 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 500 MB RAM
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Quad Core Processor
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 1 GB RAM
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
